channel.title: racket on Lambda Land
channel.description: Recent content in racket on Lambda Land

item.title: A programmable programming language? I'll drink to that!
item.description: My wife and I got a chance to go to a place that lets you paint pottery and then have it fired. The pottery is all pre-made; you just get to paint it. It’s been a very long time since I’ve worked with a physical art medium, so the mug looks kinda dumpy. I did alright with the Racket logo on the bottom-inside of the mug though! I’m working on some fun projects with Racket.
